all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For all things must be done in order, and by common consent in the church, by the prayer of faith.
Doctrine and Covenants 28:13
Quote of the Day
"Under His direction, within the order of His priesthood, the sons of God have been ordained to stand in place of the Son of God."
Emily Belle Freeman | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
